# ğŸ§  HUMAN_OR_AI & ğŸš— Used Car Price Prediction System

This repository contains **two machine learningâ€“based web projects**, developed with a strong focus on **Natural Language Processing (NLP)**, **Regression Modeling**, and **Service-Oriented Architecture (SOA)**.

Each project addresses a real-world problem and is designed with modular, scalable, and production-ready principles.

---

# ğŸ§  HUMAN_OR_AI

**HUMAN_OR_AI** is a web application that predicts whether a given text was generated by a **human** or by **artificial intelligence**, using machine learning techniques.

The project leverages **Natural Language Processing (NLP)** methods and multiple classification algorithms, providing predictions through a Flask-based web interface.

---

## ğŸ¯ Project Purpose

With the rapid growth of AI-powered text generation tools, distinguishing between human-written and AI-generated content has become increasingly important.

This project aims to build a reliable system that can classify text content as **Human-written** or **AI-generated**.

### Scope:

- Text preprocessing and analysis
- Training multiple ML classification models
- Real-time prediction via web interface

---

## ğŸ§  Models & Methodology (HUMAN_OR_AI)

### Models Used

- Logistic Regression
- Support Vector Machine (SVM)
- Random Forest

### Text Vectorization

- **TF-IDF (Term Frequency â€“ Inverse Document Frequency)**

### Model Persistence

- Trained models and vectorizers are saved as `.pkl` files
- Loaded dynamically by the Flask application

# ğŸš— Used Car Price Prediction System

The **Used Car Price Prediction System** is a machine learningâ€“based web application that estimates second-hand vehicle prices using regression models with **high accuracy**.

The system is designed following a **Service-Oriented Architecture (SOA)**, integrating multiple backend services with a web-based frontend.

---

## ğŸ“Œ Project Overview

- Predicts used car prices based on vehicle features
- Uses advanced regression models
- Clean and modular SOA-based backend
- User-friendly web interface

---

## ğŸ§  Machine Learning Models (Used Car)

- ğŸŒ² **Random Forest Regressor**
- ğŸš€ **Gradient Boosting Regressor**

### Dataset

- ~2500 real-world vehicle records
- Extensive data cleaning & preprocessing
- Feature selection and normaliza
